title: How to write a diary entry about your friend's worse behaviour - Quora

response.answer_text: Well first if it’s on an app get a privatized writing app that uses a passcode. Unless your releasing it to the public. I’d suggest Secret Notes if it is. But start off with what your friend is doing and why you think they’re doing it. And if it’s effecting you in anyway good or bad. But if it’s bad for you, you should speak up to her and tell her to knock it off
It’s your diary. There’s no wrong way to do it. If you need a starting point you can use a phrase like “I remember” or “I felt” and just go back to that if you get stuck.
